page.title: 15 Stud Farm
page.content: Stud Farm includes about 120 acres of land, including 8 acres of woodland. The crops grown are wheat, barley, oats, potatoes and a large amount of grass for hay. Hay and straw is sold or kept for peas and sugar beet. We have ducks,hens, young pheasants and horses. We keep the horses for business and pleasure. Some are taken to shows in summer. The Whitemoor Mine has affected us only during blasting to find the depth of coal. Some of our neighbours, living closer to the mine, have been affected more than us. During the recent miners' stike, some miners came down quite early in the morning asking if they could get through to the mine by crossing our land.
